Here you can see the traffic light states used by [[/setTrafficLightState.md|setTrafficLightState]] and [[/getTrafficLightState.md|getTrafficLightState]]. The upper light represents the traffic light on the north side, the lower represents the south side, etc etc. If there isn't any traffic light on one or more of the sides, it doesn't affect the others.
